data.title: Ekaterinburg weather forecast, climate chart: temperature, humidity (average
data.meta_description: Ekaterinburg current conditions, weather forecast and climate chart (temperature and humidity). Ekaterinburg free weather widget (free script for your website or blog). Ekaterinburg weather conditions, average/minimum/maximum temperature, humidity variation graphs. Ekaterinburg local time, GMT offset and weather information.

Weather Station: Ekaterinburg (latitude 56-50N, longitude 060-38E)

Local Time:

Ekaterinburg is in the "Asia/Yekaterinburg" timezone.

The "Asia/Yekaterinburg" timezone uses a Standard Time (ST) / Daylight Saving Time (DST) alternation scheme, and it currently is in ST (since Sunday, 26 October 2014, 01:00 AM local time). During ST, the offset to Universal Time (UTC, GMT or Zulu) is +5:00 hours.

Ekaterinburg will exit standard time (entering DST) on Tuesday, 19 January 2038, at 08:14 AM local time, when clocks will be turned forward 0 hour to Tuesday, 19 January 2038, 08:14 AM local daylight time. During DST, the offset to UTC will be +5:00 hours.
